name: Identify Magic
description: Identify all active magic effects on a person or item.

name: Fortify
description: Restore a small amount of armour points. Double with an assistant.

name: Wildform
description: Adopt the shape of a terrestrial animal.

name: Barricade
description: Negate the effect of a spell that hits your shield.

name: Aid
description: Heal all injuries from a target.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Double damage on a strike when flanking.

name: Slay
description: Your next two-handed swing is five times more powerful.

name: Disarm Shield
description: Your next two-handed swing will disarm the shield it hits.

name: Disarm Weapon
description: Your next swing will disarm the weapon it hits.

name: Flurry
description: Your next three dual wielded swings are three times more powerful.
